title: When is kayn coming out?
body: Just a little curious when he is coming out I'm kinda impatient and I just wanted to know. Thank you <3

replies.body: Oh man, we're just as excited as you are to get ganked through a friggin wall xD! Sadly I don't have the exact dates on when you should expect him, but typically new champs come out relatively soon after they've been announced. Be sure to check up on our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) to be the first to know!
guess what.. 12 july but kayn is still not out like they promised

maybe its just a time delay cuz wen xayah and rakan came out i was there but it took a while to actually show him
{{champion:103}}
ooh D: I can't wait for him
If everything is still on schedule, he should be out around July 12th when patch 7.14 hits the live servers (give or take a couple of days because Independence Day was last week).
